name: üçñ Miner's Inn
description: A hearty tavern where weary miners gather after long shifts underground. Known for its generous portions of meat and ale, this rustic inn offers warm beds and warmer company to those who work the depths.

name: üèπ Hunter's Lodge
description: A cozy lodge decorated with mounted trophies and pelts, where hunters gather to share tales of their expeditions. The scent of roasting venison and wild herbs fills the air, while rangers trade maps and tracking tips by the fireplace.

name: üëë Noble's Rest
description: An opulent establishment where the wealthy and influential dine on exotic delicacies and aged wines. Crystal chandeliers illuminate silk-draped dining rooms, while discrete staff attend to every whim of their distinguished clientele.

name: üòà ???'s Gullet
description: These cursed mines materialized after a hellish creature's insatiable hunger consumed too much broken memories, dreams and wanderers. The walls pulsate with digestive acids, and precious ores are embedded in crystallized bile. Miners report hearing eternal chewing sounds echoing from the deepest shafts, where the demon's stomach still digests reality itself.

name: üóùÔ∏è Rusty Relic Realm
description: Discovered when a drunk patron stumbled upon a rusty key beneath the tavern floorboards, this mine exists between dimensions. The key unlocks passages to ancient dwarven vaults frozen in time. Rust-covered mechanisms and clockwork guardians protect treasures that predate recorded history. Every surface is covered in a patina of ages, and time flows differently in each chamber.

name: ‚õèÔ∏è Coal Mines „Äé L0 „Äè
